properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 9:02AM CST until January 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise

.Recent heavy rainfall over the Green River basin has caused river
levels to rise. Minor flooding is occurring at Paradise and a crest
around 383.6 feet is forecast Monday evening.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise.
* from this morning to late Wednesday night.
* At  8:15 AM Sunday the stage was 380.2 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 383.6 feet by
late Monday evening. The river will fall below flood stage
Wednesday evening.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
